string.name: steptocreateweb
string.br: 1.If your savings are less than1000-do not invest \n
2.If your savings are 2000-5000 - invest 5% of your savings \n
3.If your savings are 5000-10000 - invest 10% of your savings \n
4.In all other cases you can invest 20% of your savings \n

resources.string: The amount of investement is- ((savings*( % of investement))/100)
